forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 30. West wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 41. West wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As the clock softly ticks toward midnight, Boston cradles itself in a blanket of calm clarity, with the night air feeling crisp and invigorating. The stars shimmer overhead as the temperatures slip close to thirty degrees, accompanied by a gentle yet assertive west wind that dances through the streets, rustling leaves and casting a feeling of neat vitality in the crisp night. A few more hours will allow the city to bask in the soothing embrace of moonlight, lending an ethereal glow to this bustling metropolis, where the echoes of laughter and distant conversations drift softly through the air.

Looking to the morrow, the sun will rise, casting warm golden rays across the frosty landscape. Expected to reach a high near forty-one, Saturday promises a splendid day, adorned with blue skies and plenty of sunshine. Winds will whisper, offering a light warmth that will make stepping outside yet more inviting. Those venturing out might opt for layered attire—comfortable sweaters under their coats, along with sturdy boots to navigate the frost-kissed pavement. This is a day well-suited for leisure strolls—perhaps along the Charles River, where the sun's reflection dances playfully on the water's surface—or an enjoyable visit to a cozy café to savor a warming cup of coffee while the world hums gently around you. In this moment of calm before the bustle, one finds an opportunity to breathe deeply and enjoy the beauty that exists in the simple act of being.
